CustomField.formula: IF( (LimitsMobilePushApexCallsUsed__c / LimitsMobilePushApexCallsMax__c * 100) >= 90, "⛔", IF( (LimitsMobilePushApexCallsUsed__c / LimitsMobilePushApexCallsMax__c * 100) < 90 && (LimitsMobilePushApexCallsUsed__c / LimitsMobilePushApexCallsMax__c * 100) >= 80, "⚠️", "✅" ) ) + ' ' + TEXT(ROUND(LimitsMobilePushApexCallsUsed__c / LimitsMobilePushApexCallsMax__c * 100, 2)) + '% (' + TEXT(LimitsMobilePushApexCallsUsed__c) + ' / ' + TEXT(LimitsMobilePushApexCallsMax__c) + ')'
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ✅ when 80% or less of the limit is used, ⚠️ when 80.1-89.9% is used, or ⛔ when 90% or more is used
CustomField.label: Mobile Push Apex Calls
